description: The conference the team is in (such as `AFC`).
The division the team is in (such as `NFC West`).
The mean (average) number of games won across the simulations, counting ties as 0.5 wins.
The rate this team made the playoffs across simulations.
The rate this team won the division across simulations.
The rate this team had the first playoff seed across simulations.
The rate this team won its conference across simulations.
The rate this team won the Super Bowl across simulations.
The rate this team received the first pick in the next draft across simulations.
The rate this team received a top five pick in the next draft across simulations.
